subject: Communication
title: Eye Contact: The Social Glue
description: A short lesson to help you apply Eye Contact: The Social Glue.

hook.text: Hold eye contact for 3 seconds: connection. Hold it for 10 seconds: intimidation. Timing is everything.

buildup.text: Eye contact activates the social brain network, triggering trust, attention, and emotional processing.

discovery.text: Comfortable eye contact lasts 3-5 seconds. Breaking first signals submission; holding too long signals dominance.

twist.text: In some cultures, direct eye contact with elders is disrespectful. The 'right amount' is culturally coded.

climax.text: Liars don't always avoid eye contact â€” some overcompensate. It's the change from baseline that matters.

punchline.text: Eyes are windows. How long you look through them is the message.
